name: Momiro VI
description:
Explore the surface of the planet Momiro VI with your rover and collect 1000 materials to win.

Made for the icth.io #2016 LOWRES game jam.

Click here to play in a new page

CONTROLS: Arrow keys or ASDW

Green material worth 1 coin

Blue material worth 5 coin

v1.04 Blue material now can be collected

v1.03 WASD control added

v1.02 Keyboard control now working through itch.io's iframe
